description:
Bring some sunny vibes to the village with this pack of summery remixes!

- "Kamura's Song of Purification: Summer Remix" BGM
- "Brave Hunters: Summer Remix" BGM
- "Best Buddies: Summer Remix" BGM
- "Making Yummy Dango: Summer Remix" BGM

After purchasing, speak to the Courier and select Add-on Content to receive the content. You will then be able to use it in the Room Customization section of the Housekeeper menu.
name: "Kamura Village: Summer Remix" BGM
